response.overview: Does Coinbase refund money? In general, Coinbase does not offer refunds for cryptocurrency transactions.+1✆(888)✆(634)✆(2381) once they have been confirmed on the blockchain. +1✆(888)✆(634)✆(2381) Blockchain transactions are immutable.+1✆(888)✆(634)✆(2381) meaning they cannot be undone or reversed. +1✆(888)✆(634)✆(2381) so it’s essential to double-check the transaction details before completing a transfer
